content:
The spokesman for the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine Dmitry Pletenchuk, which ships in the Black Sea Fleet of the Russian Federation, are currently the most dangerous for Ukraine and, accordingly, can be a priority target for Ukraine's defense forces.

Dmitry Pletenchuk's commentsgaveDuring the live broadcast in the TV. One News.

"First and foremost, the main enemy for Ukraine and effective weapons in the Black Sea of the Black Sea Fleet, the so -called, of course, the carriers of winged missiles remain," he said.

According to a spokesman for the Navy of the Armed Forces, such ships are able to operate at a fairly long distance.

“Therefore, of course, this is the main danger. It is very difficult to apply the rest of the ships for them, if it is not impossible. Because they cannot approach our coast through the work of rocket coastal artillery troops of the Navy. Therefore, in fact, these are priority ships, ”Dmitry Pletenchuk said.

As reported by the Armyinform, in the Navy of the Armed Forcestoldabout the absurdity of building new ships of the Russian Federation.
title: The Navy of the Armed Forces named priority goals among the ships of the Black Fleet
description: Dmitry Pletenchuk provided his comments during live broadcasting in the TV.
author: Army Inform
